Manhwas.name: ✨ Elissa's Whirlwind Marriage 🏅
Manhwas.description: After marrying the villain who will kill her in the future, Elissa decides to be kind to him in order to change her fate.

Manhwas.name: ✨ Evolution Frenzy 🏅
Manhwas.description: In an apocalyptic world, Duan Fei, who lost everything, dies. But he didn't expect that he would return to the beginning of everything.

Manhwas.name: ✨ Father, I Don't Want This Marriage
✨ Heavenly Demon Instructor
Manhwas.description: In a world where humanity is fighting against monsters, Hyunsoo is a powerless young man. But that changes when he meets a master, with divine powers, who is invisible to others.

Manhwas.name: ✨ I Became The Wife of The Male Lead 🎖️🏅
Manhwas.alternativeName: Me Tornei a Esposa do Protagonista

Manhwas.name: ✨ I Thought It’s a Common Possession 🏅
Manhwas.alternativeName: Eu Achei que Fosse uma Transmigração Comum

Manhwas.name: ✨ I Want to Become The Emperor, So I Need a Divorce
✨ The Heroine Had an Affair With My Fiance 🎖️🏅
Manhwas.alternativeName: A Heroína Teve Um Caso Com Meu Noivo
Manhwas.description: After being betrayed by her fiancé and the heroine, Ciella Labyrinth ends the engagement and decides to venture into a relationship with the prince.

Manhwas.name: ✨ The Story of a Low-Rank Soldier Becoming a Monarch
✨ Who Made Me A Princess 🏆🥈🎖️🏅
Manhwas.description: After being reincarnated as Athanasia, princess of an empire from a book, she discovers that her destiny is to be killed by her own father, Emperor Claude, when she turns 18.
